page.title: 15Jumping above the rest.
page.content: A survey of local newspapers revealed one feature article about this area. {Penny Cornish}was three when she started riding but she did not know then what lay ahead. Now at eighteen she hopes to enter the{1985 Horse of {the Year Show}in October. Already she has qualified for the regional finals of the{Foxhunter Competition}in August. If successful, she will go on to the finals at Wembley.{She rides 7 {horses in shows and looks after 40 at {Greenacres,}her riding stables. She qualified on{Moonlight Carousel,}and often rides{Blue Arrow Flight.}She is sponsored by{Blue Arrow Personnel {Services.}They provide her with a van to travel all over the home counties. She has, so far, competed for 4 years and hopes that{1985 will be a year to {remember.
